content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
The wait was excessive, but the food was very good! Our cook seemed to be working all the tables outside as the owner helped him. They are fairly new so it makes sense that they are getting used to the clientele etc. although the whole process did take long I would love to go back when they are more established as the food was great and the servers and owner were polite enough. Also the owner let us take the bibs home  love that part! And the ambiance was a little underwhelming as far as the Korean campsite feel, but nothing to discourage you from visiting.
